title: What word would you use to describe a person with an untamed smile? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve never read “untamed smile” … I have read “feral grin” … the untamed part is “feral”. You can use feral to describe a wild unkempt person with a disregard for social niceties.

This probably isn’t what you were looking for but I instinctively distrust someone who smiles constantly for no apparent reason. “Untamed smile” does not have a good connotation to me. The most charitable word I can come up with is ‘imbecile’.
